title: The Earth is full
description: Have we used up all our resources? Have we filled up all the livable space on Earth? Paul Gilding suggests we have, and the possibility of devastating consequences, in a talk that's equal parts terrifying and, oddly, hopeful.
author: Paul Gilding
keywords: TED, talks, cities, science, sustainability, technology, climate change, environment, alternative energy, activism, agriculture, economics, solar energy, energy, future, green, natural resources
